detail_desc: Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with gathered seams in the sides for a gentle draped effect and a high cut at the back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a sheen. Decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
Earrings in metal and plastic with a hoop and rectangular pendant. Diameter approx. 2.8 cm, length approx. 4.5 cm.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a round, deep neckline.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a round, deep neckline.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a round, deep neckline.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with an interactive motif on the front, wrapover funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with an interactive motif on the front, wrapover funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a sheen. V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves, an inset panel at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Waist bag in fabric with a zip and embroidered text on the front. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 7x12x30 cm.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high, frill-trimmed paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Unlined.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high, frill-trimmed paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Unlined.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high, frill-trimmed paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Unlined.
Double-layered hats in cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Small fabric appliqué at the front of the hem.
Underwired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Underwired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Calf-length dress in airy, sequined chiffon with a V-neck and shoulder straps that cross at the back. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top, a seam under the bust with an inset section, and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Round-necked T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Set in soft sweatshirt fabric with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers. Boxy-style top with dropped shoulders, an embroidered detail at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set in soft sweatshirt fabric with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers. Boxy-style top with dropped shoulders, an embroidered detail at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in soft velour with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a detachable tie belt under the bust, and a rounded hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with 3/4-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with 3/4-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Wide jumper in a soft, chunky jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck and low dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed, rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front and welt front pockets with a flap.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front and welt front pockets with a flap.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with a sheen. Stand-up collar, a small opening and buttons at the back of the neck, and long sleeves. Seam under the bust and a drawstring down one side to create a gathered effect.
Double-breasted jacket in bouclé made from a cotton blend with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

Sleeveless top in jersey with a unique nursing feature and lace-trimmed V-neck. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Trousers in soft cotton twill. High waist, zip fly and button, and a detachable, adjustable belt with a plastic fastener. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and tapered legs.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams.

Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide waistband containing a key pocket.
Long-sleeved, round-necked top in sweatshirt fabric with striped ribbing in a contrasting colour around the neckline. Soft brushed inside.

Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short inner tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist with a key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the outer shorts is recycled.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and sparkly stone buttons down the front. Gathered seam at the shoulders, long cuffed sleeves and ties at the hem.

Short dress in lace with a stand-up collar, covered buttons at the back of the neck and cut-out section at the back. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Scalloped trim around the collar, cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
